mapper.sql: A.STD_NO , A.CRS_CRE_CD , A.DECLS_NO , A.USER_NO , A.ENRL_STS , ( SELECT FN_GET_CODE_NAME('ENRL_STS',A.ENRL_STS) FROM DUAL) AS ENRL_STS_NM , A.REG_NO , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO) FROM DUAL) AS REG_NM , A.REG_DTTM , A.MOD_NO , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO) FROM DUAL) AS MOD_NM , A.MOD_DTTM , B.USER_NM , B.COMP_NM , C.USER_ID , ( SELECT FN_GET_CRS_STD_PRGR(A.STD_NO, A.CRS_CRE_CD) FROM DUAL ) AS PRGR_RATIO , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_exam WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND REG_YN = 'Y' ) AS EXAM_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_exam_stare WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND STD_NO = A.STD_NO AND END_DTTM IS NOT NULL ) AS EXAM_STARE_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_asmt WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND REG_YN = 'Y' ) AS ASMT_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_asmt_send WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND STD_NO = A.STD_NO ) AS ASMT_STARE_CNT , NVL(FN_GET_NULL_SCORE(( SELECT TOT_SCORE FROM tb_std_edu_rslt WHERE STD_NO = A.STD_NO )), 0) AS TOTAL_SCORE

SELECT
FROM tb_std_std A, tb_usr_user_info B, tb_usr_login C WHERE A.CRS_CRE_CD = NVL((#{crsCreCd), A.CRS_CRE_CD) AND A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND B.USER_NO = C.USER_NO AND C.USER_STS = 'U' AND A.ENRL_STS IN ('S','C','F')
AND CONCAT(B.USER_NM,C.USER_ID) like CONCAT('%',NVL((#{userNm}), ''),'%')
AND B.ORG_CD = #{orgCd}
